attributes.action: , in considering responses to the consultation on "The Governance of Britain, Flag Flying", note that the United Kingdom contains four nation states - England, Northern Ireland, Scotland, and Wales - and that they should be empowered and encouraged to fly their national flags, and that of the European Union, on every suitable public and private building, every day of the year, flying the flag of the Union only on those days where it clearly demonstrates a significant historical connection to those nation states.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In response to the consultation "The Governance of Britain, Flag Flying" to record the significance of the four states of the Union and ask the Prime Minister to encourage the flying of all national flags on every suitable building throughout the year.
